Large police presence responding to emergency incident at Stoddard Rd McDonald’s, Mt Roskill https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/large-police-presence-responding-to-emergency-incident-at-stoddard-rd-mcdonalds-mt-roskill/KJZXVASTQVD5FHUDVZT2BEAHDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/large-police-presence-responding-to-emergency-incident-at-stoddard-rd-mcdonalds-mt-roskill/KJZXVASTQVD5FHUDVZT2BEAHDM/ Around a dozen police vehicles were seen at the fast food restaurant. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 07:52:54 +0000 The scene at McDonald's on Stoddard Road in Wesley, Mt Roskill, Auckland, where someone was allegedly stabbed. January 11, 2023. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Waikato earthmoving company fined $275,000 after worker ‘buried alive’ in dirt when trench collapsed on farm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-man-buried-alive-in-dirt-after-trench-collapses-on-farm/O3II6DKPS5DC7AE67FI2DCOUJ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-man-buried-alive-in-dirt-after-trench-collapses-on-farm/O3II6DKPS5DC7AE67FI2DCOUJ4/ Belinda FeekAnthony Wanoa had just started at the company when the incident happened. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:59:33 +0000 Anthony Wanoa, 43, tried to sprint his way out of this collapsing 3m high trench without success and was engulfed in dirt as his colleague scrambled to free him. Photo / WorkSafe
Lawyer who told litigant he was mad, a liar and to ‘shut up’ rebuked over conduct https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-who-told-litigant-he-was-mad-a-liar-and-to-shut-up-rebuked-over-conduct/7I6A5J32RRGPPI2EBN2GVOAFGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-who-told-litigant-he-was-mad-a-liar-and-to-shut-up-rebuked-over-conduct/7I6A5J32RRGPPI2EBN2GVOAFGI/ Natalie AkoorieLawyer who lost composure during heated teleconference fined over unsatisfactory conduct. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:00:00 +0000 A man representing himself in a private prosecution against a woman in the District Court made "deplorable" comments to a judge after which a lawyer told him to "shut up". Photo / NZME

Operation Smelter: Eight ‘prolific offenders’ arrested for string of aggravated robberies in Waikato https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/operation-smelter-eight-prolific-offenders-arrested-for-string-of-aggravated-robberies-in-waikato/3366GH5VUNBEPL5A3N7EIMAHSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/operation-smelter-eight-prolific-offenders-arrested-for-string-of-aggravated-robberies-in-waikato/3366GH5VUNBEPL5A3N7EIMAHSU/ It comes after Waikato police executed a series of warrants yesterday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 05:00:39 +0000 Dubbed Operation Smelter, police said it has had immediate success, with arrests made, charges laid and stolen goods recovered.

Thu, 11 Jan 2024 05:00:00 +0000 An Auckland three-year-old toddler and his parents have been bashed with baseball bats by men bursting into the family's transitional housing motel room.
